      • checkRule

        public abstract java.lang.String checkRule​(TreeTransition transition)
        Checks whether the transition logically follows from the parent node using this rule
        Parameters:
        transition - transition to check
        Returns:
        null if the child node logically follow from the parent node, otherwise error message

      • checkRuleRaw

        protected abstract java.lang.String checkRuleRaw​(TreeTransition transition)
        Checks whether the transition logically follows from the parent node using this rule. This method is the one that should overridden in child classes
        Parameters:
        transition - transition to check
        Returns:
        null if the child node logically follow from the parent node, otherwise error message

      • checkRuleAt

        public abstract java.lang.String checkRuleAt​(TreeTransition transition,
                                             PuzzleElement puzzleElement)
        Checks whether the child node logically follows from the parent node at the specific puzzleElement index using this rule
        Parameters:
        transition - transition to check
        puzzleElement - equivalent puzzleElement
        Returns:
        null if the child node logically follow from the parent node at the specified puzzleElement, otherwise error message

      • checkRuleRawAt

        Parameters:

        puzzleElement - equivalent puzzleElement
        Returns:
        null if the child node logically follow from the parent node at the specified puzzleElement, otherwise error message
